title: How to unsubscribe from Zoom
description: Zoom offers various subscription plans. You can cancel your Zoom subscription through the Zoom web portal. The cancellation will be effective at the end of your current billing cycle. You will retain access to paid features until the end of the current billing term. Remember to save your cloud recordings before canceling.

steps_1.title: Cancel Zoom Subscription via Web Portal
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Zoom subscription through the web portal, follow these steps:

*   Sign in to the Zoom web portal.
*   Go to Account Management, then click Billing.
*   Alternatively, click Plans and Billing, then Plan Management.
*   Find the Zoom plan you want to cancel on the 'Current Plans' tab.
*   Click 'Cancel Plan' next to the subscription you want to stop.
*   Click 'Confirm Your Cancellation' to confirm.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.
*   If the 'Cancel Plan' option is unavailable, contact Zoom support for assistance.

steps_2.title: Cancel Zoom Subscription via Apple App Store
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Zoom subscription through the Apple App Store, follow these steps:

*   Open the Settings app on your Apple device.
*   Tap your name.
*   Tap Subscriptions.
*   Tap the Zoom subscription.
*   Tap Cancel Subscription.

steps_3.title: Cancel Zoom Subscription via Google Play Store
steps_3.description:
To cancel your Zoom subscription through the Google Play Store, follow these steps:

*   Open the Google Play Store app.
*   Tap your profile icon.
*   Select Payments & subscriptions.
*   Select Subscriptions.
*   Select Zoom.
*   Tap Cancel subscription.
